name: Kaleb
description:
Hi everyone here is my participation for My First Game Jam and also the first game that I ever made, 

Kaleb is a little puzzle game where you have to help Kaleb to get free by dragging and dropping memory cards that affects the capacities of the different entities in the game.

I would be really happy if you leave me some feedbacks (Even negative ones of course) !

Have a nice day and I hope that you will enjoy my game.
